thread.title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
thread.title_full: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards

title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
text: > Entertainment Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards FILE - In this Aug. 16, 2015, file photo, Luke Hemmings, from left, Ashton Irwin, Michael Clifford and Calum Hood, of 5 Seconds of Summer, arrive at the Teen Choice Awards at the Galen Center, in Los Angeles. Selena Gomez, Carrie Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer will be performing at the American Music Awards, on Nov. 22, 2015, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File)
